title: This can't be right?
body: So I just finished a game as Kindred jungle where I went 23/5/17 in 43:19, along with 156 farm (15 marks I'm pretty sure but I don't know if that matters). I was playing with my friend who has level 7 with Kindred and he was convinced that my score was going to be an S, however it was only A+. Now the only thing we can think of is that I was marked down for farm but even still shouldn't that have been worth an S- then? I'm not level 5 with her so its not a big problem for me now but I just cant believe that its harder than that to get an S as Kindred jungle. Does this sound right?

replies.body: Because kindred has picked up lately and a lot of people use her, as well as being easy to play and quite strong. So lots of people do well with her, meaning harder to get s

If most kindred players were getting higher than 23/5/17 in most games.... She would be the most fucked champion in existence.

So i think you may have hit off the mark there.
nerd her average kindred kda atm is above the overall game average, meaning going to be even harder than others, going 25/10/5 is the exact same as going 10/5/5.
But she didnt go 25/10 she went 25/5

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=j6NUlMV1,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2016-11-10T19:35:51.303+0000)
>
> But she didnt go 25/10 she went 25/5

You're not listening. that was an example saying kda can look extremely different but still be the same. The op's kda was , while the current for her is 8.3.
The CS is _really_ poor compared to the kindreds I have seen, even if the KDA is super high. Another 50 CS and it probably would have been S+

How much damage did you do? and how many wards were placed by you. Wards and damage dealt etc etc, all count towards a higher grade. And the farm is a little lacking for 43 minutes which also will heavily effect the outcome of the Mastery grade.

Hope this helps,
kind regards
